title: Save $300 on these M4 Pro MacBook Pros with 48GB RAM
description: B&H's latest MacBook Pro deals drop upgraded models with 48GB of RAM and 1TB of storage by $300.Save $300 on these upgraded MacBook Pros.We're following several new MacBook Pro discounts today, with B&H slashing $300 off both 14-inch and 16-inch models with 48GB of RAM and 1TB of storage. These well-rounded M4 Pro configurations in Space Black offer a good deal of performance thanks to the upgraded memory and storage capacity.14" M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB, Space Black: $2,499 ($300 off) Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: B&H's latest MacBook Pro deals drop upgraded models with 48GB of RAM and 1TB of storage by $300.
text: B&H's latest MacBook Pro deals drop upgraded models with 48GB of RAM and 1TB of storage by $300. We're following several new MacBook Pro discounts today, with B&H slashing $300 off both 14-inch and 16-inch models with 48GB of RAM and 1TB of storage. These well-rounded M4 Pro configurations in Space Black offer a good deal of performance thanks to the upgraded memory and storage capacity. 14" M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB, Space Black: $2,499 ($300 off) 16" M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB, 1TB, Space Black: $2,799 ($300 off)According to our 14-inch MacBook Pro M4 Pro / M4 Max Price Guide and 16-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide, the deals above deliver the lowest online prices available without the need to travel to a store and wait in line. B&H is also throwing in free 2-day shipping on both models on deliveries within the contiguous U.S., so you won't have to wait long for your new laptop. The company's store card, called Payboo, also has perks not found elsewhere. Grab an instant sales tax refund in qualifying states. With rates hitting 10.35% in some areas, the refund can equate to $250 to $290 back on these MacBooks for many individuals. You can find these and many more bargains on our Apple deals page, as well as in our Price Guides.
html:
B&H's latest MacBook Pro deals drop upgraded models with 48GB of RAM and 1TB of storage by $300.

We're following several new MacBook Pro discounts today, with B&H slashing $300 off both 14-inch and 16-inch models with 48GB of RAM and 1TB of storage. These well-rounded M4 Pro configurations in Space Black offer a good deal of performance thanks to the upgraded memory and storage capacity.

  • 14" M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB, Space Black: $2,499 ($300 off)
  • 16" M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB, 1TB, Space Black: $2,799 ($300 off)

According to our 14-inch MacBook Pro M4 Pro / M4 Max Price Guide and 16-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide, the deals above deliver the lowest online prices available without the need to travel to a store and wait in line. B&H is also throwing in free 2-day shipping on both models on deliveries within the contiguous U.S., so you won't have to wait long for your new laptop.

The company's store card, called Payboo, also has perks not found elsewhere. Grab an instant sales tax refund in qualifying states. With rates hitting 10.35% in some areas, the refund can equate to $250 to $290 back on these MacBooks for many individuals.

You can find these and many more bargains on our Apple deals page, as well as in our Price Guides.
